title: Edhathaan Kanduttey Nee Pudhusa Lyrics Settai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Edhathaan Kanduttey Nee Pudhusa
Lyrics: Gaana Bala
Singer: Gaana Bala
MOvie: Settai

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Edhathaan Kanduttey Nee Pudhusa
enkitta illaadhadha perusa perusa
edhuku de nee maarita dhinusa
enkooda palagunadhu palasaa palasaa
adi vaadi enkitta
nee pannaadha settai
vaadi enkitta,
nee pannaadha setta
maathaadha route-a
pootaadha gate-a
nee paathutta dhuttathaan
varamaata enkittathaan

Adi neethaan de osthi ponnaa
ada naanthaaney dustbin ah

paathu rate-a pesuda
avaluku first owner naanuda (2)
RC booka paaruda
idhu FC panna car-uda

English Translation
